title: The Future of AI in Web Development: Beyond Chatbots
excerpt: Artificial Intelligence is transforming how we build the web. From predictive UX to autonomous code generation, discover the trends shaping 2025.
content:
# The Future of AI in Web Development

The landscape of web development is undergoing a seismic shift. We are moving beyond simple chatbots and into an era of **autonomous agents** and **predictive user interfaces**.

## Predictive UX

Imagine a website that adapts its layout in real-time based on user behavior. Using reinforcement learning models, we can now create interfaces that anticipate user needs before they even click.

title: Building a Personal Brand in the Age of AI
excerpt: In a world of automated content, authentic personal branding is your most valuable asset. Strategies for standing out as a developer.
content:
# Personal Branding for Developers

Technical skills are the baseline. Your **story** is the differentiator. 

> "Your brand is what people say about you when you're not in the room." - Jeff Bezos

Building a digital garden, contributing to open source, and sharing your learning journey are the pillars of a strong developer brand in 2025.

title: Optimization Techniques for Next.js Applications
excerpt: Deep dive into advanced optimization strategies: Server Components, Streaming, and Image Optimization for perfect Lighthouse scores.
content:
# Optimizing Next.js

Performance is user experience. With Google's Core Web Vitals becoming a ranking factor, optimization is non-negotiable.

## Server Components

By moving heavy JavaScript to the server, we reduce the client capability requirement and improve TTI (Time to Interactive) dramatically.
